languages.text: Увы, как бы ни были совершенны навыки Космических волков, их было слишком мало. Места убитых офицеров занимали новые, и грозным Адептус Астартес пришлось выступить открыто. Подорвав защитные турели и открыв ворота, они стойко удерживали оборону, пока мы спешили на помощь. Решительным штурмом док был взят, пусть и ценой огромных потерь.

traits.locale_text: Лазутчики Космических волков успешно стравливали между собой отряды противника, однако вскоре те заподозрили неладное. Вскоре самих космодесантников заманили в ловушку, и нам пришлось идти на прорыв, чтобы помочь Адептус Астартес. Среди величайших воинов Императора не было потерь, однако наши войска заметно поредели под огнем защитных турелей и войск противника. Огромной ценой док был взят.

languages.text: The Space Wolves' skill was second to none, but alas, there were simply too few of them. The dead officers were replaced, and the fearsome Adeptus Astartes were forced into a direct confrontation. They destroyed the defence turrets and opened the gates, holding the line until we arrived to assist. The dock was taken in a decisive assault, albeit at great cost.
languages.original_text: Увы, как бы ни были совершенны навыки Космических волков, их было слишком мало. Места убитых офицеров занимали новые, и грозным Адептус Астартес пришлось выступить открыто. Подорвав защитные турели и открыв ворота, они стойко удерживали оборону, пока мы спешили на помощь. Решительным штурмом док был взят, пусть и ценой огромных потерь.

The dead officers were replaced, and the fearsome Adeptus Astartes were forced into a direct confrontation. They destroyed the defence turrets and opened the gates, holding the line until we arrived to assist. The dock was taken in a decisive assault, albeit at great cost.

They destroyed the defence turrets and opened the gates, holding the line until we arrived to assist. The dock was taken in a decisive assault, albeit at great cost.

languages.text: 尽管太空野狼的战斗能力无人能及，但遗憾的是，他们的人数实在是太少了。阵亡的敌方军官被替换下来，而那些强大的阿斯塔特修士不得不正面对抗蜂拥而至的敌人。太空野狼摧毁了防御炮台，打开了大门，坚守住了阵地，直到我们赶来增援为止。我们发动了决定性的进攻，拿下了码头，但却付出了惨重的代价。
languages.original_text: The Space Wolves' skill was second to none, but alas, there were simply too few of them. The dead officers were replaced, and the fearsome Adeptus Astartes were forced into a direct confrontation. They destroyed the defence turrets and opened the gates, holding the line until we arrived to assist. The dock was taken in a decisive assault, albeit at great cost.

traits.locale_text: 尽管太空野狼的战斗能力无人能及，但遗憾的是，他们的人数实在是太少了。阵亡的敌方军官被替换下来，而那些强大的阿斯塔特修士不得不正面对抗蜂拥而至的敌人。太空野狼摧毁了防御炮台，打开了大门，坚守住了阵地，直到我们赶来增援为止。我们发动了决定性的进攻，拿下了码头，但却付出了惨重的代价。

languages.text: Malgré le talent phénoménal des Space Wolves, l'ennemi était trop nombreux et remplaçait immédiatement les officiers tués. Les redoutables membres de l'Adeptus Astartes ont dû se résoudre à une confrontation directe. Après avoir détruit les tourelles de défense et ouvert les portes, ils ont tenu la position jusqu'à notre arrivée. Nous avons réussi à prendre le quai lors d'un assaut décisif, mais cette victoire nous a coûté très cher.
languages.original_text: The Space Wolves' skill was second to none, but alas, there were simply too few of them. The dead officers were replaced, and the fearsome Adeptus Astartes were forced into a direct confrontation. They destroyed the defence turrets and opened the gates, holding the line until we arrived to assist. The dock was taken in a decisive assault, albeit at great cost.

traits.locale_text: Malgré le talent phénoménal des Space Wolves, l'ennemi était trop nombreux et remplaçait immédiatement les officiers tués. Les redoutables membres de l'Adeptus Astartes ont dû se résoudre à une confrontation directe. Après avoir détruit les tourelles de défense et ouvert les portes, ils ont tenu la position jusqu'à notre arrivée. Nous avons réussi à prendre le quai lors d'un assaut décisif, mais cette victoire nous a coûté très cher.

languages.text: スペースウルフの技量は他の追随を許さなかったが、残念ながら数が少なすぎた。死んだ士官たちは入れ替えられ、恐るべき〈戦闘者〉たちは直接対決を余儀なくされた。彼らは防衛タレットを破壊してゲートを開き、我々が援護に到着するまで戦線を維持した。多大な犠牲を払ったとはいえ、ドックは決定的な攻撃で占領された。
languages.original_text: The Space Wolves' skill was second to none, but alas, there were simply too few of them. The dead officers were replaced, and the fearsome Adeptus Astartes were forced into a direct confrontation. They destroyed the defence turrets and opened the gates, holding the line until we arrived to assist. The dock was taken in a decisive assault, albeit at great cost.

traits.locale_text: スペースウルフの技量は他の追随を許さなかったが、残念ながら数が少なすぎた。死んだ士官たちは入れ替えられ、恐るべき〈戦闘者〉たちは直接対決を余儀なくされた。彼らは防衛タレットを破壊してゲートを開き、我々が援護に到着するまで戦線を維持した。多大な犠牲を払ったとはいえ、ドックは決定的な攻撃で占領された。

languages.text: La habilidad de los Lobos Espaciales era incomparable, pero eran demasiado pocos. Los oficiales abatidos fueron sustituidos y los temibles Adeptus Astartes se vieron obligados a luchar abiertamente. Destruyeron las torretas defensivas y abrieron las puertas, resistiendo hasta que llegamos para prestar ayuda. Tomamos el puerto en un asalto tan decisivo como costoso.
languages.original_text: The Space Wolves' skill was second to none, but alas, there were simply too few of them. The dead officers were replaced, and the fearsome Adeptus Astartes were forced into a direct confrontation. They destroyed the defence turrets and opened the gates, holding the line until we arrived to assist. The dock was taken in a decisive assault, albeit at great cost.

traits.locale_text: La habilidad de los Lobos Espaciales era incomparable, pero eran demasiado pocos. Los oficiales abatidos fueron sustituidos y los temibles Adeptus Astartes se vieron obligados a luchar abiertamente. Destruyeron las torretas defensivas y abrieron las puertas, resistiendo hasta que llegamos para prestar ayuda. Tomamos el puerto en un asalto tan decisivo como costoso.

languages.text: Die Fähigkeiten des Space Wolves waren einzigartig, doch leider waren es schlicht zu wenige. Die toten Offiziere wurden ersetzt, und die furchterregenden Adeptus Astartes wurden in eine direkte Konfrontation gezwungen. Sie zerstörten die feindlichen Geschütze, öffneten die Tore und hielten die Linie, bis wir zur Unterstützung eintrafen. Das Dock wurde durch einen entschlossenen Angriff erobert, wenn auch zu einem hohen Preis.
languages.original_text: The Space Wolves' skill was second to none, but alas, there were simply too few of them. The dead officers were replaced, and the fearsome Adeptus Astartes were forced into a direct confrontation. They destroyed the defence turrets and opened the gates, holding the line until we arrived to assist. The dock was taken in a decisive assault, albeit at great cost.

traits.locale_text: Die Fähigkeiten des Space Wolves waren einzigartig, doch leider waren es schlicht zu wenige. Die toten Offiziere wurden ersetzt, und die furchterregenden Adeptus Astartes wurden in eine direkte Konfrontation gezwungen. Sie zerstörten die feindlichen Geschütze, öffneten die Tore und hielten die Linie, bis wir zur Unterstützung eintrafen. Das Dock wurde durch einen entschlossenen Angriff erobert, wenn auch zu einem hohen Preis.

languages.text: Yetenek konusunda Uzay Kurtları'nın eline su dökebilecek kimse yoktu ama onlar da sayıca azdı. Ölü subayların yerini yenileri aldı ve korkulan Adeptus Astartes, doğrudan çatışmaya girmek zorunda kaldı. Savunma taretlerini yok edip kapıları açtılar ve biz desteğe gelene dek dayandılar. Rıhtım, son bir saldırıyla alınırken bunun bedeli ağır olmuştu.
languages.original_text: The Space Wolves' skill was second to none, but alas, there were simply too few of them. The dead officers were replaced, and the fearsome Adeptus Astartes were forced into a direct confrontation. They destroyed the defence turrets and opened the gates, holding the line until we arrived to assist. The dock was taken in a decisive assault, albeit at great cost.
